title: List of all Android widget  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android widget  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: ViewPagerIndicator
repoList.description: Paging indicator widgets compatible with the ViewPager from the Android Support Library and ActionBarSherlock.

repoList.name: AndroidNewWidgetsDemo
repoList.description: Android Design Support Library新控件用法大全

repoList.name: fluid-slider-android
repoList.description: :octocat:💧 A slider widget with a popup bubble displaying the precise value selected. Android library made by @Ramotion

repoList.name: direct-select-android
repoList.description: :octocat: ≡ DirectSelect is a selection widget with an ethereal, full-screen modal popup displaying the available choices when the widget is interact with.

repoList.name: Stepper-Touch
repoList.description: Stepper Touch for Android based on MaterialUp submission

repoList.name: Masked-Edittext
repoList.description: Android library contain custom realisation of EditText component for masking and formatting input text

repoList.name: StickySwitch
repoList.description: ⭐️ beautiful switch widget with sticky animation ⭐️

repoList.name: PdfViewPager
repoList.description: Android widget that can render PDF documents stored on SD card, linked as assets, or downloaded from a remote URL.

repoList.name: AndroidGpsStatus
repoList.description: An android widget library to show GPS status and signal strength

repoList.name: ma-components
repoList.description: Android library with some Widgets and handy pieces of code I have developed
